dict.string: Sceyt Chat requires access to your photo library to view and share your existing photos and videos. Please grant permission to use this feature effectively.
Sceyt Chat needs access to your photo library to let you add photos and videos to your chats. Please enable photo library access to enhance your messaging experience.
Sceyt Chat requires microphone access to record and send voice messages. Please grant permission to use this feature effectively.
Sceyt Chat needs access to your camera to let you share photos and videos during chats. Please enable camera access to enhance your messaging experience.
